channel.title: CVE Feed for GeoVision -- Door Access Control Device
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GeoVision -- Door Access Control Device

item.title: CVE-2020-3928|2024-09-17T01:21:32.177Z -- geovision -- door%20access%20control%20device
item.description: GeoVision Door Access Control device family is hardcoded with a root password, which adopting an identical password in all devices.
